name: Kaiju Stacker
description:
Stack colorful kaiju blocks in this tetris-like game.

This game was made in 48 hours for Buffalo Game Space jam 11. The theme for this jam was Kaiju. Game was made in python/art made in aseprite/music made in famitracker.

Huge shout out to Nick Cellino, Rob Rymarczyk, and Tobias John for making my silly art come to life!

And don't forget to hit F5 for a special game mode!
